snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo is to announce that he will allow 20 hospitals across New York to dispense medical marijuana, but there is little insight into the details.
abstract: Gov Andrew Cuomo is to announce that he will allow 20 hospitals across New York to dispense medical marijuana, but there is little insight into the details; his plan bypasses the State Legislature, which has failed to pass a medical marijuana bill, but it leaves much to be determined, like how patients will qualify and which hospitals will be chosen as dispensaries.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo is to announce that he will allow 20 hospitals across New York to dispense medical marijuana, but there is little insight into the details.

headline.main: With Marijuana Access on the Horizon, Patients Fear Potential Restrictions
headline.print_headline: With Marijuana Access on the Horizon, Patients Fear Potential Restrictions
